code: import returnProducts from'../../models/products';const initialState=returnProducts();export default function productReducer(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'db/productAdded':{return state.concat(action.payload);}case'db/productModified':{state[action.payload.id]=action.payload;return state;}case'db/productDeleted':{return state.splice(action.payload.id,1);}default:return state;}}
